description:
Going Variational Motivation and context How to solve PDEs with modern tools
Challenges I faced  There are tons of good resources about the FEM, its theory and practical applications and the material is indeed overwhelming. Here some books that built my path towards a medium understanding of what I’m doing:  Zienkiewicz and Taylor 2006 - The Finite Element Method for Solid and Structural Mechanics. Lanczos 1949 - The Variational Principles of Mechanics.
title: Going Variational
